sentences.en: ...the last decade of the nineteenth century.
A decade later, the company has gone from strength to strength.
sentences.cn: 十年后，该公司已经逐渐壮大。

sentences.en: A guerrilla war has lingered into its fourth decade.
sentences.cn: 一场游击战已经持续了30多年。

sentences.en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentences.en: British Rail has indeed become more commercial over the past decade.
sentences.cn: 过去10年来，英国铁路确实变得更加商业化了。

sentences.en: For a decade "X" was the pre-eminent punk band in Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 10年来，“X”乐队一直都是洛杉矶最杰出的朋克乐队。

sentences.en: If not, ask God to help you establish goals for your decade of destiny.
sentences.cn: 如果没有，那么请上帝帮助你建立你的命运十年的目标。

sentences.en: Over the decade, women in this category went up by 120%.
The 1950s were the decade of Hong Kong's industrial take-off.
sentences.cn: 20世纪50年代是香港工业开始快速发展的10年。

sentences.en: The 1980s were the hottest decade on record.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代是有史以来最热的十年。

sentences.en: The commission's conclusions sweep away a decade of denials and cover-ups.
sentences.cn: 委员会的结论将十年来的否认和掩饰无情地揭开。

sentences.en: the greatest scientific achievement of the decade
sentences.cn: 这十年最伟大的科学成就

sentences.en: the last decade of the nineteenth century
The number of people employed in agriculture has fallen in the last decade.
sentences.cn: 过去十年，农业从业人数已经下降。

sentences.en: These cameras have increased only marginally in value over the past decade.
sentences.cn: 在过去10年里，这些照相机的价格只是略有提高。

sentences.en: These developments were foreseen in embryo more than a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 这些发展早在十多年前的萌芽阶段就已预见到。

sentences.en: Two thirds of the region has been deforested in the past decade.
sentences.cn: 在过去十年里这个地区的森林有三分之二被毁掉。

sentences.en: We hope to have test flights in this decade.
sentences.cn: 我们希望在这十年进行试验飞行。
